Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. With its unique features and high-quality materials, it's truly a standout item. I believe in its value and am confident it will serve you well. For this exceptional product, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $100. Don't miss out on this opportunity to experience the benefits firsthand. If you're interested, please let me know so we can proceed with your purchase. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $100. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $100
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $150
